block.p: Shares of Parallan Computer Inc., which rose last week on an agreement with the International Business Machines Corporation letting the software maker sell I.B.M. technology and products under its own name, fell sharply yesterday because the company will no longer receive financing from I.B.M., its leading source of revenue. Parallan said it would show significant losses for the quarter and year.

Shares of Parallan Computer Inc., which rose last week on an agreement with the International Business Machines Corporation letting the software maker sell I.B.M. technology and products under its own name, fell sharply yesterday because the company will no longer receive financing from I.B.M., its leading source of revenue. Parallan said it would show significant losses for the quarter and year.
